https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/riR8waTbvkc7j6hgsaOxqA7YOyS.jpg After being assigned to an animal rescue shelter as part of his community service by his probation officer, a troubled teenager is forced to get into the spirit of the holidays when he is recruited to help find homes for twelve unwanted dogs before Christmas. 12 Dog Days Till Christmas
